thread.section_title: The Grosvenor Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely hotel in the heart of London!
thread.title_full: Lovely hotel in the heart of London! - Review of The Grosvenor Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Darren C
title: Lovely hotel in the heart of London!
text: This is a really lovely hotel in the heart of London. Rooms are surprisingly big and luxurious for a London hotel. Having a massive queen size bed for a night away was fantastic! Situated next to Victoria station travel to/from is a big bonus. Service has been great. We have really enjoyed staying here and will do so again.
